tool_description: Calculates optimal flash settings and positioning for wedding photography based on venue dimensions, ambient light, and desired lighting effects.

venue_dimensions.description: Venue dimensions in meters [length, width, height]

ambient_light_level.description: Ambient light level (bright, moderate, dim, dark)

flash_types.description: Types of flash equipment (speedlight, strobe, LED_panel, softbox)

desired_effect.description: Desired lighting effect (natural, dramatic, soft, bounced)

error_messages: Invalid venue dimensions: Provide exactly 3 positive numbers for length, width, and height in meters.
Unknown ambient light level: Use bright, moderate, dim, or dark.
Unrecognized flash type: Use speedlight, strobe, LED_panel, or softbox.
Invalid desired effect: Use natural, dramatic, soft, or bounced.
Invalid subject distance: Subject distance must be between 0.5 and 20 meters.
usage: Input venue dimensions, ambient light level, and available flash equipment. Optionally specify desired lighting effect and typical subject distance. The tool will calculate optimal flash settings and positioning.

flash_power_settings.description: Recommended power levels for each flash unit

positioning_guide.description: Optimal positioning coordinates and angles for flash units
